# 1. 

```{r}
FlipCoin = function(n) sample(0:1,n,rep=T) 
e1=FlipCoin(30) 
e1 

sum(e1==0)
sum(e1==0)/30
sum(e1==1)
sum(e1==1)/30

hist(e1,breaks=c(-0.5,0.5,1.5), prob=T) 
```
